docs.text: i've always been told that there are two things in life that are unavoidable - death and taxes .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: oddly , i've never given much thought to either of the two .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: maybe if i did , at least i'd stop getting collection notices from uncle sam .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: yes , let me make a resolution to devote myself to better record keeping , hold on to all my receipts , and to do what it takes to have the satisfaction that my returns are mistake-free and will keep me from incurring penalties .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: it seems that the issue of death may not be so different , at least envisioned here in this film .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: as this tender love story goes , if you do good things and have a clear conscience when you die , you ascend to a place of great peace and beauty .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the dreams , wishes , and fantasies that you had when you were alive come true .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: for those who die with a burdened soul , however , they wind up in that other place .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: chris and annie ( a winsome robin williams and a radiant annabella sciorra ) seem like the perfect couple that deserve all that heaven has to offer .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: their love for each other is strong and their bond is undeniable .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: but tragic events eventually tear apart the fabric of annie's happiness .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: and when chris dies after a terrible car accident , she commits suicide - a tortured soul who blames herself .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: despair is perhaps the greatest sin , and she will wallow in her guilt throughout eternity .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: chris , on the other hand , has made it to heaven , and upon learning of annie's fate , he journeys to hell to find her and to try to free her from her nightmare .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: this film brims with imagination , containing a lush imagery that shows the arcadia that is heaven and the bitterness and frightfulness that is hell .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: it seems that heaven and hell could very well be a product of our fantasies or nightmares .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: it's shape and look is as infinite as our imagination .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: as chris explores his new fantastic world and discovers things both amazing and wondrous , he also begins to learn more about himself .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: certain questions baffle him at first .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: why does his home in heaven ooze with paint ?
docs.label: positive

docs.text: what is the significance of the asian stewardess ?
docs.label: positive

docs.text: why does he have an all-too-willing guide ( cuba gooding , jr . ) to help him find annie ?
docs.label: positive

docs.text: but as he slowly begins to realize the answers , it makes him stronger and gives him a greater chance to save annie .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: " dreams " is both visually and tellingly beautiful .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: alas , i have one regret .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the movie did well to gather more and more emotional speed , but the denouement was curiously unsatisfying .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: it seemed as if it was racing to some kind of great finish , but its intensity seemed to wane in its final moments .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: however , your eyes will still well up with tears and you'll find lots to savor .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the storytelling is purposeful and well constructed .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the journey is imaginative .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: and i was surprised by how much i enjoyed this film .
docs.label: positive
